name: sRNA_bin_to_circos
tagline: Use 21, 22 and 24 nt bin files as an input to create circos plots
body:

USAGE

positional arguments:
  organism       Org: tomato, arabidopsis, etc.
  input_file     Analysis pairs in a text file
  bin_path       Path to bin files
  output_dir     Path to output directory
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
